game.description: Defeat the Dark Sorcerer and save the kingdom from destruction.
game.objective: Defeat the Dark Sorcerer Xaren who has taken over the kingdom's capital city.
game.quest_giver: King Arin, ruler of the kingdom
game.reward: A magical sword and a title of "Hero of the Kingdom"

tasks.description: Speak with the village elder in Willowdale Village to gather information about Xaren's plans.
Infiltrate Xaren's fortress and sabotage his dark magic equipment.
Engage in combat with Xaren and defeat him to save the kingdom.

game.title: Defeat the Dark Sorcerer
